articles.title: Samsung's five-year-old Galaxy Tab S2 just got a new update with the October 2020 patch - Android Central
articles.description: The Verizon variant of Samsung's Galaxy Tab S2 has received a new software update with the October 2020 Android security patch. Samsung had announced the Galaxy Tab S2 in July 2015.
articles.content: Late last month, Samsung rolled out a new security update to the Galaxy S7, a flagship phone that was released four and a half years back. As spotted by the folks at Android Police, Samsung is now ro… [+1121 chars]
